title: UEFA Champions League second qualifying round draw
body_text:
UEFA Champions League second qualifying round draw
Wednesday, June 21, 2023
Article summary
The 2023/24 UEFA Champions League second qualifying round draw took place on 21 June.
Article top media content
Article body
The 2023/24 UEFA Champions League second qualifying round draw took place at the House of European Football in Nyon, Switzerland, on Wednesday 21 June.
The two-legged ties will take place on 25/26 July and 1/2 August.
Second qualifying round draw (seeded teams in bold)
Champions path
Group 1
Winners of match 3: Žalgiris Vilnius (LTU) / Struga (MKD) vs Galatasaray (TUR)
Winners of match 2: Ballkani (KOS) / Ludogorets (BUL) vs Winners of match 5: Olimpija Ljubljana (SVN) / Valmiera (LVA)
Winners of match 4: Raków Czestochowa (POL) / Flora Tallinn (EST) vs Winners of match 1: Lincoln Red Imps (GIB) / Qarabağ (AZE)
Group 2
Winners of match 6: KÍ Klaksvík (FRO) / Ferencváros (HUN) vs Winners of match 9: Häcken (SWE) / The New Saints (WAL)
Winners of match 7: HJK Helsinki (FIN) / Larne (NIR) vs Molde (NOR)
Winners of match 8: Shamrock Rovers (IRL) / Winners of the Preliminary Round vs Copenhagen (DEN)
Group 3
Winners of match 11: Farul Constanța (ROU) / Sheriff Tiraspol (MDA) vs Winners of match 14: Hamrun Spartans (MLT) / Maccabi Haifa (ISR)
Aris Limassol (CYP) vs Winners of match 12: Partizani (ALB) / BATE Borisov (BLR)
Winners of match 15: Urartu (ARM) / Zrinjski (BIH) vs Winners of match 10: Slovan Bratislava (SVK) / Swift Hesper (LUX)
GNK Dinamo (CRO) vs Winners of match 13: Astana (KAZ) / Dinamo Tbilisi (GEO)
League path
Dnipro-1 (UKR) vs Panathinaikos (GRE)
Servette (SUI) vs Genk (BEL)
Champions path
Conditions of the draw
In accordance with paragraphs 13.03 and 13.04 of the Regulations of the UEFA Champions League 2023/24, the UEFA administration formed groups and seeded clubs for the second qualifying round draw (champions path) based on the club rankings established at the start of the season and the principles set out by the Club Competitions Committee.
The 20 teams (five that enter the competition at this stage and the 15 winners of the first qualifying round ties, indicated for the purposes of this draw as Winners of Matches 1 to 15) were divided into two groups of six teams and one group of eight teams.
Within each of the three groups, the teams were divided into an equal number of seeded and unseeded teams (three seeded and three unseeded teams in groups 1 and 2, and four seeded and four unseeded teams in group 3).
The winners of a first qualifying round match were seeded for the second qualifying round draw if either of the clubs involved in the match had a coefficient that would entitle it to be seeded.
Any changes of date and fixture reversals will be communicated in writing to your club and national association by 18:00 CET on 21 June.
Draw procedure
Three bowls were prepared for the draw, with the balls containing the names of the seeded and unseeded teams from Group 1 placed in the corresponding marked bowls.
One ball was then taken from each of these bowls and placed in the third empty central bowl, where they were shuffled. The first team drawn from this bowl was then considered the home team for the first tie, and would play against the second team drawn.
The procedure was then carried out with the remaining balls to complete all the pairings for the first group. The same procedure was then repeated to determine the pairings for the second and the third groups.
Groupings (seeded teams and pairings in bold)
Group 1
Galatasaray (TUR)
Winners of match 1: Lincoln Red Imps (GIB) / Qarabağ (AZE)
Winners of match 2: Ballkani (KOS) / Ludogorets (BUL)
Winners of match 3: Žalgiris Vilnius (LTU) / Struga (MKD)
Winners of match 4: Raków Czestochowa (POL) / Flora Tallinn (EST)
Winners of match 5: Olimpija Ljubljana (SVN) / Valmiera (LVA)
Group 2
F.C. Copenhagen (DEN)
Winners of match 6: KÍ Klaksvík (FRO) / Ferencváros (HUN)
Molde (NOR)
Winners of match 7: HJK Helsinki (FIN) / Larne (NIR)
Winners of match 8: Shamrock Rovers (IRL) / Winners of the Preliminary Round
Winners of match 9: Häcken (SWE) / The New Saints (WAL)
Group 3
GNK Dinamo (CRO)
Winners of match 10: Slovan Bratislava (SVK) / Swift Hesper (LUX)
Winners of match 11: Farul Constanța (ROU) / Sheriff Tiraspol (MDA)
Winners of match 12: Partizani (ALB) / BATE Borisov (BLR)
Winners of match 13: Astana (KAZ) / Dinamo Tbilisi (GEO)
Winners of match 14: Hamrun Spartans (MLT) / Maccabi Haifa (ISR)
Winners of match 15: Urartu (ARM) / Zrinjski (BIH)
Aris Limassol (CYP)
League path
Conditions of the draw
In accordance with paragraphs 13.03 and 13.04 of the Regulations of the UEFA Champions League 2023/24, the UEFA administration seeded clubs for the second qualifying round draw (league path) based on the club rankings established at the beginning of the season and the principles set out by the Club Competitions Committee.
The four teams were divided equally into two seeded teams and two unseeded teams.
Any changes of date and fixture reversals will be communicated in writing to your club and national association by 18:00 CET on 21 June.
Draw procedure
Three bowls were prepared for the draw, with the balls containing the names of the seeded and unseeded teams placed in the corresponding marked bowls.
One ball was then taken from each of these bowls and placed in the third empty central bowl, where they were shuffled. The first team drawn from this bowl was then considered the home team for the first tie, and would play against the second team drawn.
The procedure was then carried out with the remaining balls to complete all the pairings.
Groupings
Seeded
Genk (BEL)
Dnipro-1 (UKR)
Unseeded
Servette (SUI)
Panathinaikos (GRE)
Champions League qualifying dates
27 June Preliminary round semi-finals
30 June Preliminary round final
11/12 July First qualifying round first legs
18/19 July First qualifying round second legs
24 July Third qualifying round draw
25/26 July Second qualifying round first legs
1/2 August Second qualifying round second legs
7 August Play-off round draw
8/9 August Third qualifying round first legs
15 August Third qualifying round second legs
22/23 August Play-off round first legs
29/30 August Play-off round second legs
31 August Group stage draw
